Oct. 8, 2011 D West Wales BBA Contest (Second Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-second-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: David Johnson - euphonium (Llwydcoed). Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 5 bands competed.
Oct. 9, 2011, 9:44 p.m. July 4, 2020, 12:08 p.m.
1 Llwydcoed Band Gary Davies Portrait of a City [Sparke]
2 Lewis Merthyr Band Gareth Pritchard Portrait of a City [Sparke]
3 Briton Ferry Band Christian Jenkins
4 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden Kaleidoscope [Sparke]
5 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Colin Hogg
Withdrawn Treherbert & District Band Craig Roberts
Withdrawn Upper Rhondda Brass Band Gareth Robinson
